summary:
This is the [b]Home Crafting Mod[/B] as requested by Daventry

[b]This mod includes[/b]
A basement in the vanilla homes of skyrim. These are accessable through a trap door in easy-to-find locations throught the households.

[b]The basements include[/b]
A Tanning Rack
An Enchanter
A Workbench
A
descriptionHtml:
This is the [b]Home Crafting Mod[/B] as requested by Daventry

[b]This mod includes[/b]
A basement in the vanilla homes of skyrim. These are accessable through a trap door in easy-to-find locations throught the households.

[b]The basements include[/b]
A Tanning Rack
An Enchanter
A Workbench
A Grindstone
An Anvil
and ovens

[b]This mod does require HEARTHFIRE DLC[/b]
author: Adam Cahill
